channel.title: Code Reviews on Hype-Driven Development
channel.description: Recent content in Code Reviews on Hype-Driven Development

item.title: Let's talk about Code Reviews
item.description: Also known as “just hit accept, I checked it already!". The Code Review is a practice that dates back to ancient times when someone would finish writing some code (in this case the Hammurabi Code) and someone else would check to make sure they hadn’t made any stupid mistakes. So I guess you’ll understand me when I find it surprising we still do it wrong. What do I mean by wrong?
